  • Method Details

    • order_ui

      public static void order_ui() throws IOException
      Function to display the order submenu
      Throws:
      IOException - to hanlder clear_console()

    • create_order

      public static void create_order()
      Function to gather user input and create an new order

    • find_order

      public static int find_order() throws IOException
      Function to find a specific order. Finding an order by prompting the user and get information.
      Returns:
      returnId which is the id of the desired order to be found. Returns -1 when not found or not applicable.
      Throws:
      IOException - to hanlder clear_console()

    • update_order

      public static void update_order() throws IOException
      Function to update order. Adding/removing item/set by prompting the user and get information.
      Throws:
      IOException - to handle clear_console() function

    • print_order_invoice

      public static void print_order_invoice() throws IOException
      Function to call OrderManager to prepare the data to print when recieving an valid orderID from find_order().
      Throws:
      IOException - to handle clear_console() function

    • print_invoice_details

      public static void print_invoice_details​(String key, String content)
      A UI Function to print out the invoice details passed by OrderManager.print_invoice(order) This print function involes UTF-8 charaters for border beautifying purpose. format code like "%-25s %12s \n" is used for word alignment.
      Parameters:
      key - The invoice information name eg. ID, Table, Tax
      content - The invoice information content for specific 'key' eg: key content ID 1 Table 5 Total 15.02

    • print_sale_revenue

      public static void print_sale_revenue() throws IOException, ParseException
      A UI Function to print out the sale revenue details passed by OrderUI.print_sale_revenue_day(), or OrderUI.print_sale_revenue_month() The print funciton utilises UTF-8 characters for beautification purposes "key" to choose the options on the UItime range of the sale revenue to be printed either by day, month, year or to quit the
      Throws:
      IOException - to handle clear_console() function
      ParseException - when date cannot be formatted to the given format

    • print_sale_revenue_day

      public static void print_sale_revenue_day() throws ParseException
      When the user chooses to print the daily sale revenue, this UI method will be called Prompts the user to enter necessary details to retrieve the sale revenue from a specific day Details include the date in the format of "dd/MM/yyyy"
      Throws:
      ParseException - when user does not enter the date in the right format

    • print_sale_revenue_month

      public static void print_sale_revenue_month() throws ParseException
      When the user chooses to print the monthly sale revenue, this UI method will be called Prompts the user to enter necessary details to retrieve the sale revenue from a specific month Details include the date in the format of "MM/yyyy"
      Throws:
      ParseException - when the user does not enter the date in the right format

    • print_sale_revenue_year

      public static void print_sale_revenue_year() throws ParseException
      When the user chooses to print the yearly sale revenue, this UI method will be called Prompts the user to enter necessary details to retrieve the sale revenue from a specific month Details include the date in the format of "MM/yyyy"
      Throws:
      ParseException - when the user does not enter the date in the right format

    • print

      public static <T> void print​(T o)
